definition: marinated/to make by pickling, salting or curing
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Daeji Gal-bi is the choice pork ribs specially hand filleted, marinated in the sweet soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 腌制在甜酱油里的猪肉，吃起来又有另一番风味。

sentences.english: Cut the shrimps in half and marinate with pinchof salt and pepper for about 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 虾仁切半，用一小撮食盐和胡椒粉腌制5分钟。

sentences.english: Changes in proteins of Semimembranosus and Biceps muscles mainly happened during curing and fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 股二头肌的蛋白质降解主要是在腌制期和发酵中后期。

sentences.english: Leave an ox tongue in salt pickle.
sentences.chinese: 把牛口条放在腌菜汁里腌制。

sentences.english: Various pickled fruits and vegetables make traditional popular dishes.
sentences.chinese: 各式凉果和腌制蔬菜都是传统名菜。

sentences.english: Italian prosciutto is made by first cleaning and salting a ham.
Classic Buffalo-style chicken wing sauce is composed of 2 ingredients: a vinegar-based cayenne pepper hot sauce and butter.
sentences.chinese: 经典水牛炸翅的腌制酱料是混合醋和黄油的辣椒沙司。

sentences.english: Veal carpaccio, truffle, pickled morel mushroom.
sentences.chinese: 生薄小牛肉片，黑松露，腌制羊肚菌。

sentences.english: Eat cured or smoked meats infrequently.
sentences.chinese: 不要常吃腌制或熏烤的肉。

sentences.english: Tender strips of chicken marinated with paprika, chilli, cumin and other spices.
sentences.chinese: 嫩鸡肉条，用红辣椒，干辣椒，孜然等香料腌制。

sentences.english: Clean shrimps, drain and mix with  marinade for 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把虾洗干净，滤干然后腌制15分钟。

sentences.english: Gherkins are small cucumbers used for pickling .
sentences.chinese: 小黄瓜被用来作腌制品。

sentences.english: Cabbage, gherkin, ham and many types of fish are salted for preservation.
sentences.chinese: 腿及多种鱼类均可腌制保存。

sentences.english: Season veal rack and pan-fry till brown on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 将小牛排以调味料腌制后煎至两面金黄色。

sentences.english: Curing is used mainly to preserve fish and certain meats .
sentences.chinese: 腌制法主要用来存贮鱼类和一些肉食品。
